timeline.bodyText: I'd prefer we changed this as it reads strangely to me. So instead of "isLastCharWasEscapeChar" we could do "wasLastCharEscapeChar".
timeline.author: taikuukaits

replies.bodyText: Or if we wanted to keep the "is" maybe "isLastCharEscapeChar".
replies.author: taikuukaits

timeline.bodyText: Similarly this reads strangely. Maybe "isDoubleQuoteType" instead.
timeline.author: taikuukaits

timeline.bodyText: Small nitpick, but could we swap the if so we aren't negating the statement? I think it makes it easier to read.
timeline.author: JakeMathews
